page.title: 02ST.AGNES BEACH
page.content: ST.AGNES BEACH CAN BE VERY DANGEROUS,THERE ARE LOTS OF FALLEN ROCKS AND THERE IS A SIGN WARNING OF DANGEROUS FALLING ROCKS. THERE IS A BROKEN DERELICT HARBOUR AND THE WAVES CAN BE RATHER LARGE. SURFING IS A SUMMER SPORT. LOTS OF PEOPLE GO SURFING BECAUSE IT IS ENJOYABLE AND TOURISTS ENJOY IT ESPECIALLY IF THEY DO NOT LIVE CLOSE TO THE SEA. THERE IS A SURF SHOP WHERE YOU CAN HIRE SURF BOARDS. PEOPLE CAN TAKE SURF LESSONS WITH A LIFEGUARD.THERE ARE LOTS OF DIFFERENT TYPES OF SURF BOARDS THERE ARE BOOGIES,SWELLS,AUSSIES AND MALIBUS ON ST.AGNES BEACH. THE WIND IS USUALLY FROM THE SOUTH WEST. DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS A LIFEGUARD PATROLS THE BEACH AND GIVES ADVICE ON SEA CONDITIONS.
